channel.title: Help with making server public
channel.description: Everytime I try to add my server to the server status list, it says my server is offline. I have it registered with No-ip and i have forwarded my port but it still wont work. Is there something I can edit so that i can change the IP the server starts on when i run the file runserver.bat?

item.title: Help with making server public
item.dc:creator: @Tcbskater Tcbskater
item.description:
@Tcbskater wrote:

uhhh…how do i exactly do that? its sayin all this stuff about ip range and destination and idk what that is for mopar

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making server public
item.dc:creator: @volarscape volarscape
item.description:
@volarscape wrote:

i had the same problem, go onto were you port fowarded and u’ll see firewall add mopar to your allow list then it will work.

Read full topic
